EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal@NY (GigaOm Cancel)_Q115.Email Confirm
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed - Big Data & Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for registering to join Pivotal for a day of big data in NYC <http://connect.pivotal.io/Global_Event_PivotalNY-GigaOm-Cancel_Q115_Register.html>.
The Pivotal offices are located at 625 Avenue of the Americas in NYC.
{{my.Save The Date:default=edit me}}
We look forward to seeing you there Thursday, 3/19 @ 1:30 PM to 6:00 PM. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us at info@pivotal.io <mailto:info@pivotal.io>.
Regards,
The Pivotal Team
